ShortDescription.Value: Display current system time in CSL2 toolbar.

Publish.LongDescription:
This mod displays the current system time in the toolbar.
### Features
- Toolbar clock displaying system time - Customizable display format
### Motivation
Since the wonderful ssharp0 haven't updated their [System Clock Mod](https://mods.paradoxplaza.com/mods/107257/Windows), (which has been broken by CSL2's 1.3.6f1 update,) I figured maybe I can put together a replacement so I don't lose track of time ever so often. I rewrote the codebase because I couldn't be bothered to read through the so-very-long GPL-v3 license... (and also the hope of this being a great learning opportunity).
So, welcome to mt first experimental mod for Cities: Skylines II, which is also my first C#/React/TypeScript project. Enjoy! (And hopefully it won't break anyone's saves. I mean, I don't see how it could, but then again I am a total noob to modding. As a general precaution, always **backup your saves**.)
